_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: ZPH Quake III Arena
author: ilumos@gmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y ioquake3-server

if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/
fi

mv /usr/lib/ioquake3/* /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server

echo "Downloading Q3A assets archive"
curl -L "https://drive.usercontent.google.com/download?id=1ZQQZv4PT6yuSAQ5zoEgOen-sPKW9lCy2&confirm=y" -o "quake3-1.32-assets.zip"

echo "Extracting Q3A assets"
unzip -q -o "quake3-1.32-assets.zip"

echo "Deleting Q3A assets archive"
rm "quake3-1.32-assets.zip"

echo "Downloading configs"
cd /tmp
git clone https://github.com/zeropingheroes/game-servers.git
cp game-servers/linux/QuakeIIIArena/configs/baseq3/* /mnt/server/baseq3/

echo "Install complete"
